amendment.description: An amendment numbered 76 printed in Part B of House Report 118-602 to prohibit funds to carry out the provisions of section 50262 of Public Law 117-169 (Inflation Reduction Act).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A039) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A039) Agreed to by voice vote.
